lead_paragraph: Mike Trout wants to take a swipe at something else this season — stealing bases, the way he once did.

headline.print_headline: Mike Trout Committed to Stealing More Bases Again for Angels
headline.main: Mike Trout Committed to Stealing More Bases Again for Angels
